blogPosts.title: Building This Blog: A Modern Next.js Blog with Markdown
blogPosts.description: How I built this blog using Next.js, TypeScript, Tailwind CSS, and markdown for content management. A complete guide to creating a fast, SEO-optimized blog.

blogPosts.title: Getting Started with Next.js: A Complete Guide
blogPosts.description: Learn how to build modern web applications with Next.js, from setup to deployment. Perfect for beginners and experienced developers alike.

blogPosts.title: Mastering TypeScript: From Beginner to Pro
blogPosts.description: Dive deep into TypeScript and learn advanced patterns, best practices, and how to leverage its powerful type system for better code.
